org.drip.param.definition

Class ComponentQuote

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.param.definition.ComponentQuote
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentMultiMeasureQuote

    public abstract class ComponentQuote
extends Serializer
    This abstract class holds the different types of quotes for a given component. It contains a single market field/quote pair, but multiple alternate named quotes (to accommodate quotes on different measures for the component).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
